projects: [{"title":"Extracting and analyzing mobility patterns using Twitter data","start_date":"Jan 2021","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"‚Ä¢ Used Twitters REST API to extract most recent 3200 tweets of a list of user with geo-locations services active on Twitter‚Ä¢ Developed Heuristic classifier to classify users as tourists and residents based on tweets between 12 a.m. to 6 a.m‚Ä¢ Compared its results using ML techniques such as SVM, KNN and Ensemble Classifiers like AdaBoost, Bagging‚Ä¢ Collected, clustered all combined tweets of tourists & residents to get Point of Interest & compared K-Means, DBSCAN & Metrics"},{"title":"House Price Prediction","start_date":"Jan 2019","end_date":"Mar 2019","description":"‚Ä¢ Worked on regression problem with 79 explanatory variables to predict sales price for each house using regression techniques‚Ä¢ Performed feature engineering by drawing inferences from visualisations, followed by application of Lasso and Ridge regression‚Ä¢ Concluded the features like total basement, garage & living area as some of the most important features related to response‚Ä¢ Achieved a RMSE score of 0.13178 on the obtained Lasso model between the logarithm of predicted value & actual sales price"}]
